```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(skimr)
library(stopwords)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("clean.csv")
skim(df)
```

```{r}

df |>
  filter(!is.na(language)) |>
  group_by(language) |>
  slice_max(order_by = stargazers_count, n = 10) |>
  arrange(desc(stargazers_count)) |>
  mutate(n = 1:10) |>
  ggplot(aes(n, stargazers_count)) +
  geom_line() +
  expand_limits(ymin = 0) +
  facet_wrap(vars(language), scales = "free_y")

df |>
  select(language, full_name, description, stargazers_count) |>
  unnest_tokens(word, description) |>
  anti_join(stop_words)
```
